net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- Setup Item Types -->
[H: Location = Location]
[H: ItemTypeJsonArray = getProperty("uis."+Location+".ItemTypes")]
[H: ItemTypeList = json.toList(ItemTypeJsonArray)]

[H: fail = input("NewItemTypeList | " + ItemTypeList + " | Enter the list of possible items | Text | WIDTH=80 ")]
[H: abort(fail)]

[H: NewItemTypeJsonArray = json.fromList(NewItemTypeList)]
[H: setProperty("uis."+Location+".ItemTypes", NewItemTypeJsonArray)]

<!-- Setup Item Properties for Item Types -->
[h, foreach(CurType, NewItemTypeJsonArray, ""), code:
{
	[h: ItemPropertiesJson = getProperty("uis."+Location+".Item.Properties."+CurType)]
	[h, if(json.type(ItemPropertiesJson) == "UNKNOWN"): setProperty("uis."+Location+".Item.Properties."+CurType, "{}")]
}]

[H: InputString = 'input(']

[foreach(Type, NewItemTypeList, ""), code: {
	[H: InputString = InputString + ' " ' + replace(Type," ","_") + 'Properties | ' + json.toList(getProperty('uis.'+Location+'.Item.Properties.'+Type)) + ' | Enter properties of item type ' + Type + ' | Text | WIDTH=80 ", ']
}]

[H: InputString = InputString + ' "")']
[H: fail = eval(InputString)]
[H: abort(fail)]

[H: NewItemPropertiesJson = "{}"]
[foreach(Type, NewItemTypeList, ""), code: {
	[H: NewItemPropertiesJson = setProperty("uis."+Location+".Item.Properties."+Type, json.fromList(eval( replace(Type," ","_")  + "Properties")))]
}]

<!-- Edit Equipment Slots -->

[H: EquipSlotsJsonArray = getProperty("uis."+Location+".EquipSlots")]
[H: EquipSlotsList = json.toList(EquipSlotsJsonArray)]

[H: fail = input("NewEquipSlotsList | " + EquipSlotsList + " | Enter the list of possible slots a player can equip | Text | WIDTH=80 ")]
[H: abort(fail)]

[H: NewEquipSlotsJsonArray = json.fromList(NewEquipSlotsList)]
[H: setProperty("uis."+Location+".EquipSlots", NewEquipSlotsJsonArray)]

<!-- Edit what Items can be used in Equipment Slots -->

[H: ItemTypeJsonArray = getProperty("uis."+Location+".ItemTypes")]
[H: ItemTypeList = json.toList(ItemTypeJsonArray)]
[h: EquipSlotTypesJson = getProperty("uis."+Location+".EquipSlotTypes")]
[H, if(json.type(EquipSlotTypesJson) == "UNKNOWN"), code: {
	[H: EquipSlotTypesJson  = "{}" ]
};{

}]

[H: InputString = 'input(']

[foreach(Type, NewEquipSlotsList, ""), code: {

	[H: InputString = InputString + ' "TAB | ' + Type + ' || TAB",']
	[H: JsonTypeCheck = json.get(EquipSlotTypesJson, Type)]

	[foreach(ItemType, ItemTypeList, ""), code: {	
		
		[H, if(json.type(JsonTypeCheck) == "UNKNOWN"):
		InputString = InputString + ' " ' + replace(Type, " ", "_") + replace(ItemType, " ", "_") + ' | 0 | Player can equip ' + ItemType + ' in this slot | CHECK ", '  ;
		InputString = InputString + ' " ' + replace(Type, " ", "_") + replace(ItemType, " ", "_") + ' | ' + json.contains(json.get(EquipSlotTypesJson, Type), ItemType) + ' | Player can equip ' + ItemType + ' in this slot | CHECK ", ']
		
	}]

}]

[H: InputString = InputString + ' "")']
[H: fail = eval(InputString)]
[H: abort(fail)]

[H: NewEquipSlotTypesJson = "{}"]

[foreach(Type, NewEquipSlotsList, ""), code: {

	[H: NewList = ""]	

	[foreach(ItemType, ItemTypeList, ""), code: {	

 		[H: NewList = if(eval(replace(Type, " ", "_") + replace(ItemType, " ", "_")) == 1, listAppend(NewList, ItemType) , NewList)]
	}]

	[H: NewEquipSlotTypesJson = json.set(NewEquipSlotTypesJson, Type, json.fromList(NewList) )]

}]

[H: setProperty("uis."+Location+".EquipSlotTypes",NewEquipSlotTypesJson)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Create Database

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: Location = arg(0)] [H:ColorList = "D6D3BD,DEDFCE"] [h: TotalItems = getProperty("uis."+Location+".IdIndex")] [h, if(TotalItems == ""): TotalItems = 0] [h: setProperty("uis."+Location+".IdIndex",TotalItems)] [macro("MDB_returnItemTypes@"+getMacroLocation()): json.fromList(Location)] [H: ItemTypesList = json.toList(macro.return)] [foreach(Type, ItemTypesList, ""), code: { [macro("MDB_returnItemsOfType@"+getMacroLocation()): json.fromList(Location+ "," +Type)] [H: AllItemsOfType = macro.return] [macro("MDB_returnPropertiesOfType@"+getMacroLocation()): json.fromList(Location+ "," +Type)] [H: ListOfItemProperties = json.toList(macro.return)] [macro("MDB_returnItemsOfTypeLength@"+getMacroLocation()): json.fromList(Location+ "," +Type)] [H: NumberOfItems = macro.return] [macro("MDB_returnIDsOfType@"+getMacroLocation()): json.fromList(Location+ "," +Type)] [H: AllIDsOfType = macro.return] [foreach(Property, listDelete(ListOfItemProperties, 0),""), code: { }] [C(NumberOfItems,""), code: { [H: CurrentItem = json.get(AllItemsOfType, roll.count)] [H: CurrentID = json.get(AllIDsOfType, roll.count)]
[R: macroLink(Type, "Dialog Item Editor Popup@"+getMacroLocation(), "self", json.fromList(Location+ "," +Type + "," + TotalItems), token.name )][R: Property]
[R: macroLink(json.get(CurrentItem,listGet(ListOfItemProperties, 0)), "Dialog Item Editor Popup@"+getMacroLocation(), "self", json.fromList(Location+ "," +Type + "," + CurrentID), token.name )] [R, foreach(Property, listDelete(ListOfItemProperties, 0),""): '' + json.get(CurrentItem, Property) ] }]
}]

In the event there is no item in that spot it will add a new item. --> [if(argCount() != 4), code: { [H: input("FAIL | This function requires 4 arguments | You called setItem with " + argCount() + " arguments | LABEL") ] [H: abort(0)] };{ [H: Location = arg(0)] [H: ItemType = arg(1)] [H: ItemNumber = arg(2)] [H: ItemJson = arg(3)] }]
[H, if(json.type(ItemJson) == "UNKNOWN"), code: { [H: input("JUNK | To prevent damage to Inventory System Item was not set | WARNING INVALID JSON OBJECT! |LABEL")] [H: abort(0)] };{}]
[H: ExistingItemCheck = getProperty("uis."+Location+".Item."+string(ItemNumber))] [H, if(json.type(ExistingItemCheck) == "UNKNOWN"): ExistingItem = "No"; ExistingItem = "Yes"]
[if(ExistingItem == "No"), code: { [H: AllItemsNameJson = getProperty("uis."+Location+".Item.Names")] [H, if(json.type(AllItemsNameJson) == "UNKNOWN"): AllItemsNameJson = "{}"]
[H: AllItemsIDJson = getProperty("uis."+Location+".Item.IDs")] [H, if(json.type(AllItemsIDJson) == "UNKNOWN"): AllItemsIDJson = "{}"]
